nodes.text: The south landing bay was a part of the Confederate listening post, Skytop Station. It was there that the Twilight landed to extract a Jedi strike team and where Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, his Padawan Ahsoka Tano, Captain Rex, Sergeant Denal and a clone trooper pilot stood their ground against a squad of Super Battle Droids and three Vulture droids.
